import React from 'react' import collegeImage2 from './CollegeImage2.jpg' import collegePhoto from './CollegePhoto.JPG' import collegeImage5 from './CollegeImage5.jpg' import TextContainer from './textContainer' export default function HomePage() { const imageContainerStyle = { border: '10px solid cyan', // Add a border to the container width: '70%', // Set the width to 70% height: '40%', // Set the height to 50% display: 'block', margin: '20px auto', // Center the image }; const imageSizeStyle = { height: '500px', // Set a fixed height objectFit: 'cover', // Maintain aspect ratio and cover the container }; return (
) }
